content.text:
# Schwartziella obesa

Schwartziella obesa is a species of minute sea snail, a marine gastropod micromollusk in the family Zebinidae, found in the Cape Verde archipelago.
Description
The height of the shell attains 5.5 mm.
Distribution
This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off the Cape Verdes.
References
* [https://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/page/32698369#page/29/mode/1up Rolán E. & Luque Á.A. 2000. The subfamily Rissoininae (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Rissoidae) in the Cape Verde Archipelago (West Africa). Iberus 18(1): 21-94]
* Rolán E., 2005. Malacological Fauna From The Cape Verde Archipelago. Part 1, Polyplacophora and Gastropoda.
